control.description: KoolAjax is simple and easy-to-use PHP Ajax Framework, facilitating data exchange between server-side and client-side. KoolAjax also provides number of client-side utility functions to ease developing task. Furthermore, with UpdatePanel, a special feature of KoolAjax, developers can create a great ajax application without javascript knowledge.Using KoolAjax, you will be amazed with its power and simplicity.
